attributes.review: So I decided to download the app to find out Trump policies for the upcoming here if reelected. The minute I open the app it started to track my location, and even ask to have access to my microphone. This app is spying on people from the moment you open it or have it on your phone. This is breached of privacy. I can’t believe this. Then it started asking all these personal questions to send money to his quote campaign. Like I will give you that information when he hasn’t released his own taxes return yet. I deleted this app right away. And would tell anyone never to Download this app it’s a scam!!!!
attributes.title: I CANT BELIEVE THIS 😵😵

attributes.review: ok so i downloaded this app bc i wanted to see what the people saying that donald trump is my president. and i didn’t know ugly orange ogers can run for president. i just wanted taco bell.. if he’s my president how come he can’t buy me that. and he asked for my location.. MY LOCATION..? THATS NOT OKAY AND VERY DISRESPECTFUL FULL (i’m practicing my karen) so he didn’t buy me taco bell. and my throat hurts and i blame the orange and back to topic i never even knew this orange looking oger was my president. obama is my president. it was very scary the amount of trump supporters on this app. i have nightmares 😿 because of this app. i cant believe all these ppl think there educated.. like no obama is better. and #allappsmatter and i wanna talk abt trump 2020 like no *obama 2020 i fixed it for u guys :) uneducated trump supporters 🥰
